thread.title: Sports news in brief, Sept. 30, 2015

author: The Associated Press
title: Sports news in brief, Sept. 30, 2015
text:
Sports news in brief, Sept. 30, 2015 
Derrick Rose Sports news in brief, Sept. 30, 2015 Associated Press | 0 comments 
FIFA bans Blatter ally Jack Warner for life over repeated bribery 
ZURICH — Four years after stepping down in disgrace, former FIFA vice president Jack Warner was banned from soccer for life on Tuesday, accused of repeated acts of bribery related to World Cup bidding votes.
